/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, predominantly red and white, rise high into the clear blue sky, their vibrant colors contrasting with the serene blue of the sky. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars, buses, and pedestrians going about their day. The image is a panoramic view, offering a comprehensive look at the city's daily life.
